## Importing meta data

```{r}
segments.metadata <- read.csv("~/Documents/prototyping/xml-parser/files/GLC_meta.csv", header=TRUE)
knitr::kable(segments.metadata[0:5, ], caption = "Table with kable")
```

## Importing correct segments

```{r}
segments.correct <- read.delim("~/Documents/prototyping/xml-parser/files/segments-correct.tsv", header=TRUE)
```

## Importing segments with errors

```{r}
segments.errors <- read.delim("~/Documents/prototyping/xml-parser/files/segments-errors.tsv", header=TRUE)
# knitr::kable(segments.errors[0:5, ], caption = "Table with kable")
```

## Joining correct

```{r}
segments.metadata$ID <- trimws(segments.metadata$ID, which = c("both"))
joined.seg.dplyr  <- inner_join(segments.metadata, segments.correct, by = "ID")

joined.correct <- merge(segments.metadata, segments.correct, by="ID")

knitr::kable(joined.correct[0:5, ], caption = "Table with kable")
```

## Joining errors

```{r}
joined.errors <- merge(segments.metadata, segments.errors, by="ID")

knitr::kable(joined.errors[0:5, ], caption = "Table with kable")
```
